item.description:
you will need to bring the Basics (harness, shoes, atc/locking biner) OPEN TO ALL Levels and Climbing abilities. Now if you have rope and webbing to set up top rope bring them. Other stuff you might want to bring snacks, water and anything else you might want. also with the weather the way it is you might want to bring some Hand warmers.

those that need a ride, i can pick you up at Sullivan train station(orange line) @ 9am
item.how_to_find_us: we'll meet in the parking lot by the gate leading into the quarries.
item.name: Lets Climb Quincy Quarries
